data.title: The IV Fluids Lifeline
data.meta_description: A market leader in IV fluids and irrigation products, Baxter provides consistent, sustainable supply in critical times. You always have a lifeline.
data.text:
You count on critical IV fluids to be there when and where you need them. That's why Baxter is committed to and has invested in its manufacturing footprint, distribution centers and the largest IV fluids portfolio to meet customer needs. All of this is backed by 90+ years of experience. Why settle for 'more' when you can have the most?

A Leader in IV Fluids

95% of Baxterâ€™s IV fluids and irrigation products for the U.S. market are made in North America.2 Because natural disasters and emergencies can happen anywhere, we also have plants across the globe to provide IV fluid supply when necessary. Baxter continues to meet increased needs while serving our customers. We provide confidence and transparency in product supply and availability.
